鑯鑯鑯

鑯字的基本解释

鑯
jiān
铁器。
古同“尖”，尖锐。

鑯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》子廉切，平鹽，精。］
亦作“鋟2”。亦作“鑯1”。
(1)细小锐利的末端；顶端。
(2)末端细小、尖锐。
(3)形成尖形。
(4)新颖别致。
(5)形容锋利。
(6)指特出的人或物。参见“尖子”、“尖兒”。
(7)形容声音高而刺耳。
(8)感觉灵敏。
(9)指集中注意力（听、看）。
(10)在旅途中休息、进饮食。
(11)在前或先行的。参见“尖兵”。
(12)围棋术语。
(13)钻进。
(14)尖刻；刻薄。
(15)方言。奸滑；精明。

鑯字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑯； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1326第30
【唐韻】子廉切【集韻】將廉切，?音尖。【說文】鑯器也。一曰鐫也。【徐鉉曰】今俗作尖，非是。【爾雅·釋山·銳而高註】言鑯峻。【疏】銳則鑯也。言山形鑯峻而高。【博雅】銳也。　又【集韻】千廉切，音籤。刻也。與鋟同。

鑯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鑯字的起名意思

暂无。

Tan
Basic explanation of words
Tan
jiān
Ironware.
Gu Tong is "pointy" and sharp.
Tan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Zilian cut, flat salt, fine. ]
Also known as "Cenium 2". Also known as "鑯1".
(1) Small sharp end; top.
(2) The end is small and sharp.
(3) Form a pointed shape.
(4) Novel and unique.
(5) Describe sharp.
(6) Refers to a special person or thing. See "tip", "tip".
(7) Describes a high and harsh voice.
(8) Sensitive.
(9) Refers to paying attention (listening, seeing).
(10) Rest and eat during the journey.
(11) Prior or preceding. See "Pioneer".
(12) Go terms.
(13) Drilling.
(14) Acrimonious; mean.
(15) Dialects. Tricky; shrewd.
Tan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鑯; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1326 Page 30
[Tang Yun] Zilian cut [Jiyun] Cut Lian with a tip. [Said the text] Tanqi also. One said, also. [Xu Xuan said] Today's vulgarity is sharp, not true. [Erya·Shishan·Ruiergao Note] Yan Yanjun. [Sparse] Rui Zetan also. The mountain shape is steep and high. [Bo Ya] Rui Ye.　[Jiyun] Qianlian cut, with phonetic sign. Engraved too. Same as 锓.
Tan

jiān

* вм. 镌 (зубило; резец)
